gui.betterroulette.config.title: Roulette Settings
gui.betterroulette.config.name: Name
gui.betterroulette.play.title: Play Roulette
gui.betterroulette.tooltip.name: Name of the roulette displayed in chat. Supports color codes (&).
gui.betterroulette.tooltip.cost: Amount required to play (Vault is required).
gui.betterroulette.tooltip.use_vault: Enables cost payment using the economy plugin (Vault).
gui.betterroulette.tooltip.set_item: Sets the item currently held in the main hand as the cost.
gui.betterroulette.tooltip.entry_desc: Message displayed to the player upon winning.
gui.betterroulette.tooltip.weight: Probability weight. Higher values mean a higher chance of winning.
gui.betterroulette.tooltip.color_picker: Click to open the color palette.
gui.betterroulette.tooltip.is_jackpot: If enabled, triggers a fancy effect upon winning.
gui.betterroulette.tooltip.command: Command executed upon winning. The selector @dp is replaced by the winner's name.
gui.betterroulette.tooltip.delete: Deletes this roulette entity from the world.
gui.betterroulette.tooltip.mix_mode: If ON, entries are finely divided and mixed randomly (probabilities are maintained).
gui.betterroulette.tooltip.mix_slots: Number of divisions in Mix Mode (Default 60). Higher numbers mean finer slots.
chat.betterroulette.play.no_cost: §cYou do not have enough to play.
chat.betterroulette.play.no_entries: §cNo prizes are configured for this roulette.
chat.betterroulette.result.title: %s Result
